title: How do I reset Messages app search back to search text instead of "links" and "images"?
content: Fully update phone and apps.  I set the Messages app search to "links" of a text string.  Now I want to search the text in that text string, but I cannot find a setting that allows me to revert back to searching the text of the message string.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
